name: By Crom : The Book
description: OH MY GOD IT'S ALL THE BLACK AND WHITE COMICS! Tadah! The By Crom collection of comics. All 52 of the black and white comics, the paper doll, some behind-the-scenes pinups and a longform travelogue comic awaits in this perfect-bound, magazine sized collection! Clocking in at 68 pages, 7.6" x 10", this magazine-sized book will entertain, educate, and possibly even advise you on some of life's big questions.

options.name: Default

name: Orin in the Weald: A Sketchbook Development Zine
description: Orin in the Weald is a zine-sized sketchbook of my development work for Orin and the Dead Man's Sword, an uncanny fantasy comic. The sketchbook has a glossy colour outside and inside cover, and 24 black and white pages of character development, environment design, and creature research. There's even a bonus comic at the end! The zine is 5.5" x 8.5", a total of 28 pages including the cover, and printed on a silky, opaque 28lb paper.

options.name: Default

categories.name: Orin and the Dead Man's Sword

name: By Crom! the Full Colour Originals!
description: Beautiful 10" x 7" comics on 10" x 14.25" Canson Art Boards, drawn in archival Pigma ink pens and watercoloured by hand. These are not just charming comics, but vibrant and colourful paintings that will look beautiful on the wall. Some comics have test colour swatches or small doodles in the margins of the page, while others are completely pristine. All comics have been initialled and dated. They are listed by Conan's phrase, you can browse all the published ones right here! I will be shipping these rolled lengthwise, with a cover sheet and a certificate of authenticity, into a capped and taped 18" heavy cardboard tube. They will need to be laid flat and weighted to lose the curve, but will flatten out, don't worry! All of the shipping options include package tracking, as I know this is a precious purchase and I don't want anything to happen to your baby! Otherwise, the shipping is kept as low as possible - unfortunately those numbers are simply the reality for shipping packages from within Canada. When your order is shipped, I will email you the tracking information, so make sure your paypal email address can receive emails, or that you let me know in your paypal buyer notes which email to send it to. PS: All the fantastic folks who buy original art MAY ALSO receive little paper tokens of gratitude in the tube with your painting, so keep an eye out as you unpack your order!

options.name: *facepalm*
Where is the glory in that?
If you do not want a fight, perhaps sheathe your weapons.
Are you preparing for a new quest?
Ah, solitude. A warrior's natural state.
Perhaps you might feel better if you acted a little less sick?
I don't have any ideas! - Then you must go get some!
Treasures ask not how you won them.
Whatever the curse, you cannot lift it from underneath a pillow.
Battles can only be won one at a time.
Where do we quest next?
You are STILL preparing for your quest?
ARISE! A new battle awaits you!
This is NOT the finery I was expecting.
"Later"?!
Well, it cannot have escaped unaided!

name: Limited Edition, Signed and Numbered By Crom Poster!
description: These glossy, richly coloured poster prints are signed and numbered and limited to an edition of 150! They were created to commemorate the By Crom! Launch Party in August, and feature noted Toronto landmark-under-fire Honest Ed's, something I was really pumped to paint. They will be shipped rolled with a protective cover sheet in a 12" heavy cardboard tube. Shipping within North America includes tracking. HOWEVER. The default shipping cost outside of North America does not include package tracking as I know its costs may be prohibitive for some people. If you are an international customer and wish to purchase tracking on your poster, please select the "Shipping Internationally with tracking" option in the menu below and I will be sure to send your package with a tracking number. All packages shipped with tracking numbers will have their numbers emailed to you upon shipment, so make sure your paypal email address can receive emails, or that you let me know in your paypal buyer notes which email to send it to.

options.name: Standard shipping as listed:
Shipping Internationally with tracking:

name: Cromulent Postcard Comics!
description: These are gorgeous and glossy oversized (5.5" x 8.5") postcard prints of the By Crom comics and pinups. These guys come in singles or in packs of 3, and you can pick three different comics or three of the same! (I'll send you any of the comics from the tumblr, which you can browse here.) When you go to paypal to pay, you can enter which comics you want in the "seller instructions" box. You can link me to them, or you can quote me Conan's tagline. If there's any confusion I'll be sure to check with you via email before I send them! Otherwise I will hand pick a surprise for you from the stack of all the postcards, which could be fun, hey? Thanks guys!

name: By Crom : The PDF
description: OH MY GOD IT'S 52 COMICS! Tadah! The By Crom collection of comics. All of the black and white comics, the paper doll, some behind-the-scenes pinups and a longform travelogue comic awaits in this hi res digital collection! Clocking in at 68 pages, this beautiful high-resolution PDF will entertain, educate and possibly even advise you on some of life's big questions. I will email the link to the pdf to your paypal email unless otherwise instructed, so do fill out that "seller instructions" form if you want it sent elsewhere!
